casebody.data:
Third Department,

January, 1985

(January 2, 1985) The People of the State of New York ex rel. C. James Lombardi, Jr., Petitioner, v Eugene S. LeFevre, as Superintendent of Clinton Correctional Facility, et al., Respondents.

Application, pursuant to CPLR 7002 (subd [b], par 2) for writ of habeas corpus denied (see People ex rel. Thomas v LeFevre, 102 AD2d 925). Main, J. P., Casey, Weiss, Mikoll and Yesawich, Jr., JJ., concur.
